Package com.dev.yvgenijsharovskij.n5kanjiandkanjistoryquiz.qna

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    QNA_fragment.Callbacks
    Required callback interface to delegate functionality back to the hosting activity.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    QNA
    Represents the QNA data that is retrieved from the db according to the user selection and then displayed in the QNA_fragment.
    QNA_activity
    This class is the activity for the QNA Fragment that shows the QNA for the quiz.
    QNA_fragment
    Shows the QNA according to the selected and / or default settings.
    QNAControlQuestionHelper
    Singleton helper class for the QNA control questions, as set in the AppPreferences class.
    QNAManager
    Singleton manager class for the qna package.
    QNAOnExitDialog
    Extends the CustomDialogFragment class to show an AlertDialog with "Yes", "No" and "Dismiss" action buttons in order to allow the user to either:
      "Yes": start QNASummaryActivity to show a summary of the quiz results so far "No": start StartActivity to go back to the start page "Dismiss": dismiss the dialog
      Called from QNA_activity.onBackPressed().
    QNAonShowHintDialog
    Extends the CustomDialogFragment class to show an AlertDialog with a "Dismiss" action button in order to allow the user to view a hint for the currently quizzed question.
    QNAPreferencesActivity
    Activity for the QNAPreferencesFragment that allows the user to set-up the quiz before it is started.
    QNAPreferencesFragment
    This class is a fragment for the QNAPreferences.
    QNASavedProgressHelper
    QNASavedProgressHelper is hereby defined here as the saved state of the quiz.
    QNASettings
    Manager singleton class for the QNA, which will exists as long as the application stays in memory.
    QNAStartButtonPreference
    Placeholder class for a custom button which serves as a Preference inside a PreferenceScreen.
    QNASummaryActivity
    This class is the activity for the QNASummaryFragment that shows the summary for the quiz.
    QNASummaryBarChartBuilder
    Builds a QNASummary BarChart.
    QNASummaryFragment
    Fragment that shows a summary of the current quiz.
    QNASummaryTable
    Contains data for a single row in the QNASummary table.
    QNASummaryTable.Comparators
    Comparators for table sorting in an inner static class.
    QNASummaryTableBuilder
    Builds a QNASummary table based on the data provided through the QNASummaryTable class.
